Download free map, help charity:water 
下载免费地图，助力慈善项目：水资源
The Travelling Trader is free in the Minecraft Marketplace!
旅行的商人免费登场 Minecraft 市场！

Earlier this year, we supportedcharity: water, an incredible organisation that’s on a mission to bring clean water to every person on the planet. You can read about the $10,000 donation we madehere. But that’s enough.今年早些，我们支持了 慈善项目：水资源，这是一个绝赞的、以为地球上每一个人带来清洁的水为目标的组织。你可以在这里看到我们捐赠的一万美元，不过那已经够多了。

Wait a minute, no it isn’t! 663 million people currently lack access to clean water (that’s almost 1 in 10 people), which makes the great work of charity: water absolutely essential. They want to bring clean water to as many people as possible, and we want to help them more.等一下，它一点也不够！目前有 6.63 亿人没法接触到清洁的水资源（几乎是每 10 个人里就有 1 人），这使得慈善项目：水资源有了绝对的必要性。他们想要给尽可能多的人带来清洁的水资源，我们也想更多地帮助他们。

So we teamed up with the excellent content creatorsJigarbov Productions.They’ve crafted together a fantastic new map and skin pack,The Travelling Trader.Go to theMinecraft Marketplace on Xbox One, Windows 10 Edition, iOS, Android and Nintendo Switchand you can download it for free! Shall we watch a trailer of this terrific new Minecraft adventure? Let’s!所以我们和优秀的内容创作者团队 Jigarbov Productions 联合。他们一同制造了优秀的新地图和皮肤包——旅行的商人。你可以到 Xbox One、Windows 10 版、iOS、Android 或 Nintendo Switch 平台上的 Minecraft 市场免费下载！要不要看一个有关这个新的 Minecraft 冒险的绝佳预告片？来吧！

【装作这里有一个预告片】

“But hang on,” I hear you cry. “Does this mean I get a free llama skin? Also, what does this have to do with charity: water?” Well, to answer both your questions, you actually getllama skins, and as soon asThe Travelling Trader has been downloaded from the Minecraft Marketplace 100,000 times, we’ll make a new donation to charity: water of $90,000. That’ll bring us to $100,000 donated, which means ten water projects supported by Minecraft!「等一下，」我听到你的呼喊了，「这是否意味着我能免费得到行商骆驼的皮肤？另外，这将会对慈善项目：水资源做些什么？」好，我将回答你的这两个问题。你确实得到了行商骆驼的皮肤，并且当旅行的商人在 Minecrat 市场上被下载 10 万次时，我们会立刻向慈善项目：水资源再捐赠 9 万美元。这样我们就一共捐赠了十万美元了，是上次我们支持的水的慈善项目的十倍！

Charity: water estimates that the number of people impacted by a $100,000 donation is over 3,300. So all you have to do is download a great map and skin pack, and you’ll help us help a fantastic cause! Every time we call on you to do something like this, you always smash the target in an incredibly short amount of time, and once you’ve downloaded the map 100,000 times, we’ll share the great newson Twitter!慈善项目：水资源估计，被十万美元捐赠所影响的人数将超过大概 3300 人。所以你所需要做的就是去下载一个极佳的地图和皮肤包，然后你就会和我们一同助力一个伟大的项目！每次我们号召你们做一些像这样的事情的时候，你们都会以难以置信的短时间达成目标。一旦你们下载了这张地图十万次，我们就会在 Twitter 上分享这一巨大新闻！

Head to the Minecraft Marketplace now and thank you for helping us help charity: water!现在就去 Minecraft 市场吧，感谢你和我们一起帮助慈善项目：水资源！

【作者：Tom Stone，发布日期：2019-04-26，译者：SPGoding】
